summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs of the Dallas City Council will convene on December 23, 2024, at 9:00 AM in the Council Chambers at Dallas City Hall. The meeting aims to discuss the qualifications of candidates for the city manager position and make recommendations to the city council.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from previous meetings on December 12 and December 16, 2024.
2. Interview and deliberation of candidates for the city manager role, facilitated by Baker Tilly, with a recommendation of final candidates to be presented to the city council.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include a closed session to discuss candidate qualifications, adhering to Texas Open Meetings Act provisions. This session may involve sensitive discussions regarding the appointment and evaluation of public officers.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval of the minutes from prior meetings and aims to finalize a list of candidates for the city manager position to recommend to the full city council. The outcome of these discussions will influence the selection process for the city's administrative leadership. 

The meeting will be accessible to the public both in-person and virtually, with live broadcasting available on Spectrum Cable Channel 16 and online.
